creator: mario@dedenet.de
text:
Hello,

I have an apache setup with virtual hosts jailed in a chroot directory using sbox.

Since the users can only see the chrooted filesystem, they don't know the
absolute path to the AuthUserFile/AuthGroupFile as the Apache Server needs it.

While in general the FTP root is equal to the Virtual-Serverroot it would be
much easier for the users to guess the correct path to their .htpasswd file.

A virtualroot Directive for the <VirtualHost> context could help alot for such a
case.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 25469 ***
